header.title: Privacy Policy
header.description: We are committed to protecting your data and privacy. This document transparently explains how we handle your information at Next Commerce.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to <bold>Next Commerce</bold> ("we" / "us" / "our platform"). This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share information we obtain from users when they use our platform. By using Next Commerce, you agree to the collection and processing of your data according to the terms below.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We may collect different types of information depending on how you use the platform, including for example:

list.account: Account Information: Name, email, phone number, address (if required), payment data (if available).
list.usage: Usage Information: Your activities on the platform (stores, orders, logins, preferences).
list.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, browsing activity within the platform.
list.other: Other information you choose to provide voluntarily, such as when contacting support or filling out surveys.

usage.title: 3. Why and How We Process Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

list.1: Operating the platform and providing services (account creation, order processing).
list.2: Improving user experience and analyzing behavior.
list.4: To communicate with you (notifications, updates, technical support).
list.5: For security and fraud prevention purposes.
list.6: For marketing purposes (subject to your explicit consent).

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
sharing.content: We will not sell or rent your personal data for advertising purposes without your consent. We may share information with service providers we rely on to operate the platform (such as hosting, payment processing), or legal authorities when strictly necessary and to comply with laws.

storage.title: 5. Data Storage and Protection
storage.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary. We take strict technical and security measures to prevent unauthorized access. If you wish to delete your data, you can request this via official contact channels.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We may use "cookies" or similar technologies to collect usage data and improve performance. You will be notified upon first entry, and may be asked for consent.

list.1: Access the data we hold about you.
list.2: Request correction or update of your data.
list.3: Request deletion of your data or restriction of processing.
list.4: Object to processing or withdraw consent.

updates.title: 8. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via the platform or email. It is recommended to review this page periodically.

contact.title: 9. Contact Points
contact.question: Have a question about your privacy?
contact.help: We are here to help anytime.
